activities:
Visitors to SignUp4's website may provide personal information, such as name and contact information, to inquire about our services or to seek marketing information. SignUp4 will only collect, transfer and use this information in accordance with its privacy policy and for the purposes for which it was provided.
In addition, SignUp4 may transfer personal information provided by clients in connection with SignUp4's provision of services to those clients. Any such information is transferred for event registration, air travel or payment processing purposes only and in accordance with and to further the purpose of SignUp4 clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: SignUp4 commits to the European Union Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) or their authorized representatives for on-line data.
